Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at Kedzie/21st
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie due to, street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Kedzie, Ogden, California, Cermak and Kedzie, due to street blockage near Kedzie/21st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Balbo
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses temp. rerouted NB: Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State and Madison; SB: Washington, Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Balbo, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State and Madison.

Southbound buses will operate via Washington, Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Balbo
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses temp. rerouted NB: Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State, Washington and Michigan; SB: State, Balbo, Michigan, Roosevelt and LSD.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Michigan/Balbo, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt, State, Washington and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via State, Balbo, Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore Drive.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #10 Museum of Science & Industry Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Balbo
ShortDescription: Northbound 10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt and State due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt and State, due to street blockage near Michigan/Balbo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay at 87th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier delay at 87th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
